name: Silverwood Bay: An Eleanor Grey Mystery
name_original: Silverwood Bay: An Eleanor Grey Mystery
description:
Mystery writer Eleanor Grey has just moved from the big city to Silverwood Bay in search of inspiration for her next novel, but it doesn’t take long for the inspiration to find her! Embark on a thrilling hidden object adventure with "Silverwood Bay: An Eleanor Grey Mystery"



Explore captivating scenes filled with hidden clues and uncover the truth behind the old brooch and romantic note found in a mysterious package from her friend Josie.

Features

  • Follow the story of Eleanor Grey
  • Solve a Romance Mystery
  • Go on an Adventure in Silverwood Bay
  • 28 chapters with 1-2 sub scenes
  • 28 subgames relating to the story

Collector's Edition

  • 7 Epilogue chapters
  • 7 Epilogue chapter wallpapers
  • Music player

Join Eleanor as she unravels the secrets of Silverwood Bay and brings her long-awaited story to life in this immersive hidden object game.
